attributes.action: Turkey Wildfires: Help Turkey in need of fire planes & assistance.
attributes.additional_details: Turkey does not have sufficient fire planes and cannot overcome this devastating issue. They need immediate help from other countries as it’s spreading rapidly. We need the Government/ Parliament to help and call other countries for help.
attributes.background: Turkey is in need for the UK to help and call for other countries; extinguish the fire that has already destroyed over 60 locations including settlements, forests and animals.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: 

Help Turkey with the wildfires
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593834
